Package io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.assets

Class AnimationBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.TypedJsonObject
io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.assets.AnimationBuilder
@Environment(CLIENT) public final class AnimationBuilder extends TypedJsonObject
Builder for a texture animation file (namespace:textures/block|item/textureid.mcmeta).
